analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ dassanena pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na sanidassana sa paṭigham na na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā
ekavīsa adhipatiyā ekavīsa pe avigate ekavīsa
